Destiny 2 Enchant spells

# Spell passive enchants

Effect Name Effect Name TL Ky Lo Ju Re Na Ha Summary
効果上昇 Effect UP ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ Increases damage by 3/6/9/12%. Has no effect to extentions and Crystal Incarnations/Mystics
TP減少軽減 Reduce TP cost ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ TP cost is reduced by 4/8/12/16%
詠唱加速 Casting speed UP ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ Casting speed increases by 3/6/9/12%
属性抵抗上昇 Elemental Armor ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ Increases the resistance to an element by 6/9/12/15% for 8 seconds after using an arte with that elemental attribute. For Meteoric Rise, increases cast speed by the same amount instead
リカバー Recover ◯ ◯ ◯ Based on the enchant level, clears Poison/Weak/Paralysis/Slow and Freeze status effects, including previous level effects
攻撃力- Shave ATK ◯ 50% chance of momentarily reducing foe ATK by 6/10/14/18%
防御力- Shave DEF ◯ ◯ ◯ 75% chance of momentarily reducing foe DEF by 6/10/14/18%
命中- Shave ACC ◯ ◯ 75% chance of momentarily reducing foe ACC by 6/10/14/18%
回避力- Shave EVA ◯ ◯ 75% chance of momentarily reducing foe EVA by 6/10/14/18%
SP- Shave SP ◯ ◯ ◯ 45% chance of momentarily reducing foe SP by 15/20/25/30%
TP- Shave TP ◯ ◯ 35% chance of momentarily reducing foe TP by 12/16/20/24%
硬直時間加算 Spell Iron Stance ◯ ◯ ◯ Adds 3/6/9/12 Frames of Iron stance
毒効果 Poison ◯ 9% chance of inflicing poison status effect, poison strength based on enchant level
麻痺効果 Paralysis ◯ 6% chance of inflicing paralysis status effect, paralysis strength based on enchant level
凍結効果 Freeze ◯ ◯ 4% chance of inflicing freeze status effect, freeze strength based on enchant level
鈍足効果 Slow ◯ 6% chance of inflicing slow status effect, slow strength based on enchant level
ゲットアイテム Get item ◯ ◯ Increses foe normal drop rate by 5/10/15/20% if the foe is finished by the arte set with this enchant
